mer-masin-text: S Design Studio has been operating in Yerevan and Ijevan since 2006. Years of experience and responsibility are a guarantee of trust and long-term  cooperation. Our team is ready to implement every idea of ​​the client, the best programs and  ready to find the most effective ways to implement the work.
dizayn-text: We offer design services for both printing and digital platforms
service-1-items: Branding| Logos| Advertising materials (business card, booklet, leaflet, etc.)| label design| product design / stands, signs | pictures of posting on social networks
service-2-items: Facade measurement| design | Preparation | Installation | Warranty service
service-2-subtitle: Outdoor advertising has an independent place in the advertising market. It makes not only the organization recognizable but also the facade or the building where the advertisement is placed. Our professional team is ready to offer different solutions and approaches to make your brand even more visible.
Մենք առաջարկում ենք լուսային վահանակնե: We offer complete package of light panels, light letters, printing banners, signs for the customers
service-3-items: business cards| Postcards| Booklets| Design and making of banners and  other printing materials
Թվային հարթակների արագ զարգացման փաստը: The fact of the rapid development of digital platforms is obvious, but it does not prevent large-format digital prints from remaining relevant in marketing campaigns. We offer printing of large format banners, self-adhesive membranes, as well as posting works.
service-4-items: Milling and Engraving according to your own drawing, or the file processed by us| Laser engraving and cutting: we perform laser cutting works / orgapak, alikabond, PVS, plywood, ABS, leather| Plotter works: cutting and pasting advertising texts on facades, making self-adhesive stickers, exterior and interior glass upholstery
Առաջարկում ենք ֆրեզերային և լազերային հե: We offer the following milling and laser services:
